newsitem.title: USA: Gynecare Inc sees trials completed early.
newsitem.headline: Gynecare Inc sees trials completed early.

text.p: Gynecare Inc said Wednesday the patient treatment phase of its U.S. clinical trials of its uterine balloon therapy system will be completed earlier than expected.
The company said in a statement the patient phase will be completed by late September or early October instead of at the end of the year as originally expected.
Since January, Gynecare has been working with physicians in the U.S. and Canada on the randomized trials of women who suffer from menorrhagia, or excessive menstrual bleeding.
Gynecare said it has begun to compile the follow-up data in anticipation of filing for U.S. Food and Drug Administration approval in 1997.
